title: Creating space
creator_credit: Peter Lauterman, Angelo Stea and Gatineau
brief_description: An Artist commune in Toronto for painters, weavers, sculptors, photographers and architects, operating on a co-operative basic with the artists sharing living space and sharing ideas. Narrated by Peggy Graham.
description: An Artist commune in Toronto for painters, weavers, sculptors, photographers and architects, operating on a co-operative basic with the artists sharing living space and sharing ideas. Narrated by Peggy Graham.
